code: import React from'react';import'../style/Pagination.css';import'../style/GlobalStyle.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Pagination=function Pagination(_ref){var postsPerPage=_ref.postsPerPage,totalPosts=_ref.totalPosts,paginate=_ref.paginate;var pageNumbers=[];for(var i=1;i<=Math.ceil(totalPosts/postsPerPage);i++){pageNumbers.push(i);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"paganation-outer",children:pageNumbers.map(function(number){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"paganation-btu",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"paganation-button gifont",onClick:function onClick(){return paginate(number);},children:number})},number);})});};export default Pagination;
